casebody.data:
STATE
v.
MAZUR and Mazur 332P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2018 Richard Croutharmel, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Mazur, Michael Stanley. Matt Sawchak, Solicitor General, Ryan Park, Deputy Solicitor General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Kathleen M. Joyce, Attorney at Law, Brockton, MA, Aaron Thomas Johnson, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Mazur, Anne-Marie.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Michelle Liguori, Solicitor General Fellow.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of October 2018 by Defendant (Anne-Marie Mazur) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of October 2018."
